document_data.name: Trinzas
document_data.mainbody:
'''Trinzas''' was a [[goblin]] warrior and a member [[cult of the Absolute|cult]] of [[the Absolute]] in late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|Forgive the reception, eh, mate? Had some intruders a while back. Can't be too careful.|Trinzas.}}
document_data.Description: She had yellow-green skin and wore a crudely-made set of [[chainmail]], adorned with metal plates and animal bones.
document_data.Possessions: In battled, Trinzas wielded a giant [[greataxe]].
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, a few adventurers and [[Halsin]], the [[archdruid]] of the [[Emerald Grove]], attempted to infiltrate the cult's fortress, the [[Shattered Sanctum]]. Trinzas' fellow cultists managed to capture the druid, and turned away the adventurers that accompanied him. Afterwards, Trinzas and other cult warriors remained on high alert.
